Recruitment / Promotion Norms for Faculty Members

Assistant Professor (AP)

Engineering
Qualification:
B.E. / B.Tech. / B.S. and M.E. / M.Tech. / M.S. or Integrated M. Tech. in relevant branch with first class or equivalent in any one of the degrees

Experience:
NIL

Others:
• Proficiency in teaching and research
• Good in communication skills (oral as well as writing)

Science / MCA / MBA
Qualification:
SCIENCE: At least 55% of marks (or) an equivalent CGPA at the Master’s degree level in the relevant subject. Besides, fulfilling the above qualification, candidates should have cleared the National Eligibility Test (NET) conducted by the UGC or the CSIR or similar tests accredited by the UGC like SLET/NET. Ph.D. Candidates shall be exempted from the requirement of SLET/NET.

MCA: B.E. / B.Tech. / B.S. and M.E. / M.Tech. / M.S. or Integrated M.Tech. in the relevant branch with First Class or equivalent in any one of the degrees (OR) B.E. / B.Tech. and M.C.A. with First Class or equivalent in any one of the two degrees (OR) Bachelor Degree of three years duration with Mathematics as a compulsory subject and MCA with First Class or equivalent *

MBA: Bachelor’s Degree in any discipline and Master’s Degree in Business Administration / PGDM / C.A. / ICWA/ M.Com. with First Class or equivalent #

Experience:
* 2 years of relevant experience after acquiring degree of MCA.
# 2 years of relevant professional experience after acquiring the Master’s degree.

Others:
• Proficiency in teaching and research
• Good in communication skills (oral as well as writing)

Scale of pay (Basic + Grade pay)
15600+6000 =21600
(Note: Rs.3250/- has been added to Basic Pay to attract good talent)
